/* kr.go.bai.eip.dcm.acm.dao.DCMACM021PMapper.selectEdtAuthHisList*/
SELECT DECODE(H.EDT_AUTH,'Y','권한부여','권한회수') AS EDT_AUTH_DVSN_TXT , NVL(F_CODE_NM('1000176', H.EDT_PST_CD), F_CODE_NM('1000173', H.EDT_RANK_CD)) AS PST_NM /*직위명*/ , F_DPT_INFO(H.FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD, '1') AS DPT_NAM /*부서명*/ , F_USR_INFO(H.EDT_CNB,'2') AS USR_NM , TO_CHAR(H.FRT_REGI_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS') AS EDT_AUTH_DH , H.REASON , H.AUTH_SEQ , H.AUD_YR , H.AUD_NO , H.AUD_STEP_CD , H.DOC_ID FROM TBDCMACM202H H WHERE H.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND H.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND H.AUD_STEP_CD = #{audStepCd} AND H.DOC_ID = #{docId} ORDER BY AUTH_SEQ DESC
